evidence.claim: GlobalMed utilizes AWS API Gateway for managing and securing their APIs.
The company claims to support FHIR and HL7 standards for interoperability.
GlobalMed integrates with various EHR systems to streamline health data exchange.
Their cloud infrastructure is primarily built on AWS for scalability and reliability.

icp.icp_reason: GlobalMed uses X12 standards for healthcare data exchange, supporting key transactions.
matched_use_cases: Interoperability with EHR systems using FHIR and HL7
